title: Base Contribution Request
description: Base Data contract for finding, creating and modifying contribution records via the Court Data API

effectiveDate.description: The date the contribution record became effective

calcDate.description: The date the contribution record was calculated

contributionCap.description: The cap that was used when calculating contribution amounts

upliftApplied.description: Indicates if an income uplift was applied

basedOn.description: Indicates what the contributions are based on (e.g. Means assessment)

transferStatus.description: The transfer status of the contribution record

dateUpliftApplied.description: The date that an income uplift was applied

dateUpliftRemoved.description: The date that an income uplift was removed

createContributionOrder.description: Indicates whether a contribution order should be created
